chart_description: This chart displays the throughput of reads and writes of the Netdata DB engine in unit of MiB/s. It helps to monitor and optimize data operations in the database engine.

dimension_descriptions.reads: The amount of data being read per second from the Netdata DB engine in unit of MiB/s.
dimension_descriptions.writes: The amount of data being written per second to the Netdata DB engine in unit of MiB/s.
